name: Little Lost Robot (GaidenX)
description:
• We are an indie game Brazilian developers.
  • Our objective:
    • We want the challenge the player through games focusing on logical puzzles.

Follow our page: Lotus Games Dev

How to play:
  • Use directional keys or WASD to move your character.
  • Space to jump and Space more Shift to dash in air.
  • Esc key to quit or to access menus in-game.
  • Use the TAB key to automatically skip to the next steps and see the whole game
Have fun!
